title: OneTrust
description: Offering a robust platform for managing data and AI governance while ensuring compliance with international privacy regulations, this company empowers over 14,000 businesses to streamline risk management and optimize data strategies for innovation.

title: Qarma
description: Offering an integrated compliance management solution, this software stands out by streamlining legal and regulatory processes, minimizing operational risks, and enhancing peace of mind for businesses navigating complex global regulations.
